summary: Only legendary Japanese garage rock band Guitar Wolf can stand between a race of aliens from destroying earth with an army of zombies.
cast: Guitar Wolf|Drum Wolf|Bass Wolf|Masashi Endô|Kwancharu Shitichai|Makoto Inamiya|Haruka Nakajo|Shirô Namiki|Taneko|Yoshiyuki Morishita|Masao|Tawaki Fusamori|Akihiko Murata|Enami Esako|Kae Egawa|Hizume Giga|Kikuchi Shichihengu|Akito Murakami|Susie|Nishizawa Shihomi|Senachuo Norikazu|Yasuhiko Miyauchi|Shiobara Masamori|Nozue Takahiko|Misumi Takashi|Jun'ichi Hayakawa|Higasayama Kunihito|Atsuo Kobayashi|Yôko Asada|Yarago Karuko|Haruna Ikezawa|Mishimo Yutaka|Takasugi Kodai
title: Wild Zero
